nodes.text: The Sith Lord Kanno of the reconstituted Sith Empire had a young daughter who lived on the Sith world of Korriban during the Galactic War.

In 3640 BBY, whilst stationed at the Axial Park Imperial Garrison on the war-torn world of Corellia, Lord Kanno remarked his interest in "domesticating" the fierce Selonians for his daughter on Korriban to keep as a pet.
